Sentencas: In order to develop co-fired yttrium-stabilized zirconia (YSZ)-based solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), stable and easily sintered Y0.7Ca0.3Cr1-xZnxO3-delta (x = 0-0.15) perovskite oxides were synthesized by the microwave-aided sol-gel process and then examined as novel ceramic interconnect materials.
Titulo: Stable, easily sintered Ca-Zn-doped YCrO3 as novel interconnect materials for co-fired yttrium-stabilized zirconia-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: (The characterizations focused on phase structure, sintering behavior, relative density, electrical conductivity and thermal expansion.)
Titulo: Stable, easily sintered Ca-Zn-doped YCrO3 as novel interconnect materials for co-fired yttrium-stabilized zirconia-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The XRD analysis indicates that a pure orthorhombic perovskite phase was obtained for all the samples.
Titulo: Stable, easily sintered Ca-Zn-doped YCrO3 as novel interconnect materials for co-fired yttrium-stabilized zirconia-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Cell Volume decreases as x increases from 0 to 0.10.
Titulo: Stable, easily sintered Ca-Zn-doped YCrO3 as novel interconnect materials for co-fired yttrium-stabilized zirconia-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Y0.7Ca0.3Cr0.9Zn0.1O3-delta (YCCZ10) powder exhibited the best sintering ability, and a relative density of 96.6% Could be obtained for the sample sintered at 1400 C for 4h in air.
Titulo: Stable, easily sintered Ca-Zn-doped YCrO3 as novel interconnect materials for co-fired yttrium-stabilized zirconia-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrical conductivities of the specimens increase with the Zn2+ content at x 0.10, but then remarkably decrease at x = 0.15, which might relate to the over-range of the substitution amount of Zn (0.15) for Cr position.
Titulo: Stable, easily sintered Ca-Zn-doped YCrO3 as novel interconnect materials for co-fired yttrium-stabilized zirconia-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: YCCZ10 shows a remarkable electrical conductivity of 20.9 S cm (1) I at 850 C in air, and a very suitable thermal expansion coefficient value of 10.8 x 10 (6) K (1) (YSZ: similar to 10.8 x 10 (6) K (1)).
Titulo: Stable, easily sintered Ca-Zn-doped YCrO3 as novel interconnect materials for co-fired yttrium-stabilized zirconia-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These investigations have indicated that YCCZ10 is a promising interconnect material for co-fired YSZ-based SOFCs.
Titulo: Stable, easily sintered Ca-Zn-doped YCrO3 as novel interconnect materials for co-fired yttrium-stabilized zirconia-based solid oxide fuel cells
